profile: My name is Tim Larsson and I have studied Master of Science in Industrial Engineering and Management with specialization in Mechanical Engineering and Sustainable Product Innovation. After graduation, I have worked as Product Manager at Semcon, which is also my current work. My education has created conditions for being able to adapt, integrate and structure both internal and external resources and skills to achieve results. As a Product Manager, I have transformed my theoretical knowledge to experience that is needed to be able to create competitive advantages in rapidly changing environments.
